entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as saying 'who was he tryin' ter curse?' and looking outraged when Malfoy called Hermione a 'Mudblood'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being pale and sweaty after being affected by the slugs.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who called Hermione a 'Mudblood'. He comes from a family that thinks they are better than everyone else because of their pure-blood status.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts. She was called a 'Mudblood' by Malfoy and explained what it means to Ron.

relationships.description: Malfoy called Hermione an insulting name, 'Mudblood', which is a derogatory term for someone who was born to non-magical parents.
